means: 列阵部队，列成战斗队形的部队；武装部队

PerfectNetExp.abs: suburbia 郊区居民（总称）battalia 战斗的陈列juvenilia 少年文艺读物

auth_sentence.content: "Don't try to psych out the test," says Jo Bennett, a partner at Battalia Winston, an executive recruiting firm in New York.
